00024 #ifndef COIN_SOCOMPOSEVEC3F_H
00025 #define COIN_SOCOMPOSEVEC3F_H
00026 
00027 // Warning for application programmers: do not include this header
00028 // file in your application code if you want to stay sourcecode
00029 // compatible with SGI or TGS Inventor.  In those Inventor
00030 // implementations, all SoCompose* and SoDecompose* engine classes are
00031 // defined in the header file SoCompose.h.
00032 
00033 #include <Inventor/engines/SoSubEngine.h>
00034 #include <Inventor/engines/SoEngineOutput.h>
00035 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFFloat.h>
00036 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFVec3f.h>
00037 
00038 
00039 class COIN_DLL_API SoComposeVec3f : public SoEngine {
00040   typedef SoEngine inherited;
00041 
00042   SO_COMPOSE__HEADER(SoComposeVec3f);
00043 
00044 public:
00045   SoMFFloat x;
00046   SoMFFloat y;
00047   SoMFFloat z;
00048 
00049   SoEngineOutput vector; // SoMFVec3f
00050 };
00051 
00052 #endif // !COIN_SOCOMPOSEVEC3F_H
